title: How to get into IISER with Board exam marks if I did not take biology in 12th - Quora
tags: Education and Career Exam and Test Advice
Indian Institutes of Science Education and Research (IISERs)

response.answer_text: You do not get into IISER via your board exam marks. You qualify for appearing for the entrance test via board exam marks, where your subjects are irrelevant. It is your performance in this exam that decides whether you get in.

Minati Das, You have to appear for IISER competitive test. Typically happens in Feb/Mar. Watch IISER website for dates. I suggest go for KVPY/JEE and other similar exams so that you will have a better timing and sense while appearing for such competitive exams Good Luck and Cheers!
